tweet_text:
@deltdiggs @HunterMMeadows @TheHarryBalczak "the JD guy"...you mean the guy that did not support secession but went with his state? 

Citizenship prior to the 14th Amendment was through the state, which legally seceded. There was no treason. How will you convince anyone of your case when you believe in myths?
